Method Detail

generateRSA

public static void generateRSA(int keySize,
                               java.io.File saveTo)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.security.InvalidParameterException
Generate a RSA key and save to file.

Parameters:
keySize - the key size in bits, must >= 512 (required by Java).
saveTo - the place to save the generated file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - the keySize is invalid or error occurred when writing to file
java.security.InvalidParameterException - keySize is invalid

generateAES

public static void generateAES(int keySize,
                               java.io.File saveTo)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Generate a AES key and save to file.

Parameters:
keySize - the key size in bits
saveTo - the place to save the generated file
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - keySize < 8
java.io.IOException - error occurred when writing to file

renewAESIV

public static void renewAESIV(java.io.File file)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              InvalidFormatException
Renew the 128-bit initial vector in the AES key file.

Parameters:
file - the AES key file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when reading/writing to the key file
InvalidFormatException - the format of the content in the key file is invalid

generateRandom

public static byte[] generateRandom(int length)
Generate a random byte array with specified length in byte. (Low efficiency)

Parameters:
length - the length in byte, not allow <= 0
Returns:
the random generated byte array
